name: Defiant
summary: Raises the user's Attack by two stages for each stat that is lowered, including Attack.
viability: Bisharp became one of the biggest threats in the entire game because of this ability. Due to the use of Sticky Web, Bisharp will automatically get a +2 Attack, at the cost of Speed. In addition, Defiant completely reverses Intimidate, giving it +1 Attack instead of -1. For any Pok√©mon with Phyiscal prowess, this is the ability to use.
